channel.title: DeltaScape Reloaded
channel.description:
What is the server like? I'll be working on many pking fixes, since pking is why people mainly play private servers.
When this server comes up, the XP will be doubled for about 2 weeks.
Update logs: 7/5/09 Dark bow has improved, it will always hit at least 8 with special. Magic shortbow has improved. Starter inventory has been changed. Prayer bonus draining will now be 100% like RuneScape, exact timers. HP bar will no longer turn green when you KO someone, it stays red. Death fixed, so you don't lose items before the death animation starts.
7/4/09 Range, such as special attacks, will now be more realistic looking. They will show up after a delay. Working on making special attacks hit more, successful so far.
7/3/09 Finished barrows minigame. Barrows features: Arrows above heads. All npcs talk when they are spawned. You get teleported to tunnel when you go to your hidden tunnel.
Finished mage arena minigame
Mage Arena features: Arrows show above npc's heads Melee and range will hit 0s Proper npcs Proper emotes You can only have one of each cape Npcs disappear when you leave
7/2/09 Sounds added. Admins can no longer :: pickup, so they can do what normal players do. Start of new barrows. Start of mage arena minigame. Start of agility. Melee damage formula redone. Vengeance will now hit on npcs
7/1/09 Void range damage lowered. Void melee damage lowered by a little bit. Dark bow damage lowered. Magic shortbow damage lowered. If you eat, your attacks won't stop, so you won't have to click again. Special damage now shows at same time (For example, if you use DDS special, both damage will show automatically). For special attacks, the second attack didn't drain prayer if you had smite on. This has been fixed. Prayer will now drain slower. Granite maul now no longer glitches, so it is perfect.
Pictures: New barrows [URL=http://img3.imageshack.us/i/dsrev1.jpg/][IMG]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/6226/dsrev1.jpg[/img][/URL] Clan chat [URL=http://img3.imageshack.us/i/clannwq.jpg/][IMG]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/3839/clannwq.jpg[/img][/URL] Instant DDS special [URL=http://img3.imageshack.us/i/dsrev2.jpg/][IMG]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/9581/dsrev2.jpg[/img][/URL] Mage arena [URL=http://img5.imageshack.us/i/dsrev3.jpg/][IMG]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/1053/dsrev3.jpg[/img][/URL] New realistic dark bow [URL=http://img5.imageshack.us/i/stevensgif.gif/][IMG]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/2291/stevensgif.gif[/img][/URL]

item.title: DeltaScape Reloaded
item.dc:creator: @i_duh_loot i duh loot

@i_duh_loot wrote:

dbow hits dont hit at the same time, the second arrow has a delay.

Read full topic

item.title: DeltaScape Reloaded
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Word Life, post:29, topic:286838”][quote author=knova link=topic=379332.msg2852786#msg2852786 date=1246645591]
yea, i don give ::pickup command to anyone even myself, u need rights of 16 to be able to ::pickup in my server XD!!
[/quote]

Why not just Delete pickup instead of making it different rights? Less space in your client class.[/quote]
The amount of space in the client class does not determine how much lag the server will have. It’s the methods and processes that are initialized that cause lag. If I had 500 usable commands on my server, but they are not used, no lag will occur.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Word_Life Word Life
item.description:

yea, i don give ::pickup command to anyone even myself, u need rights of 16 to be able to ::pickup in my server XD!!

item.title: DeltaScape Reloaded
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:27, topic:286838"][quote author=Vic_ link=topic=379332.msg2858192#msg2858192 date=1247008058]

Administrators should only be there to administer the game, just like moderators are there to moderate the game. They should not be able to use so many commands, in my opinion.

Ban,Mute,IPmute, IP ban and Jail aren’t that many options

  • Ban - jail - Ipmute - Reset drops - Combat
  • Unban - unjail - unIPmute - Reset NPC - ect…
  • Mute - IPban - PNPC - Pickup
  • Unmute - Unipban - UNPC - Master

Seems like a lot to me.
[/quote]

Most of those should be removed anyway.[/quote]
Such as jail, unjail, pnpc, unpc, pickup, master, and combat.

Read full topic
